entry.dcterms:description: 1) party preferences, popularity of politicians, evaluation of the work of the government and opposition, subjective financial situation, evaluating the economic situation of Hungary 2) habits of taking a holiday 3) family relations, participation in the work of social organizations, associations, asking for help and support, relationships with friends and acquaintances, influential acquaintance, social activity, relaxation, entertainment, foreign acquaintances 4) workplace harms, knowledge about work protection, health damaging factors 5) supply with infocommunication tools, computer and internet use
entry.dcterms:subject: family life, marriage, relationship
political institutions, public administration
mass media
economic conditions and indicators
leisure, tourism and sport
working conditions
social welfare policy and systems
time use
community, urban and rural life
labour and employment
mass political behavior, attitudes
information society
person
survey data
time-series

A multi-stage proportionally stratified random probability sample representative of the Hungarian adult population. Unsuccessful inquiries were substituted with supplementary addresses, where persons to be interviewed were selected on the basis of the Leslie Kish key.
face-to-face interview
A
